attributes.action: run for President of the United States
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A great number of people in the US, both Democrat and Republican would like to have an intelligently eloquent, sharp, focused, and humble candidate to vote for.  Mr. Blair has proven to the true deomocracies of the world what he is made of.  It's the next logical step for him: leader of the most powerful country in the free world.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
